commands.title: Init
commands.description: Initates SFMC DevTools or adds additional credentials to your project.

commands.title: Join
commands.description: Clones an existing project from git.

commands.title: Upgrade
commands.description: Add NPM dependencies and IDE configuration files to your project.

commands.title: Reload BUs
commands.description: Loads the list of available BUs from the server and saves it in your project.

commands.title: Bad Keys
commands.description: Lists metadata with random API names in specified Business Unit directory.

commands.title: Document
commands.description: Creates Markdown or HTML documentation for the selected type.

commands.title: Select Types
commands.description: Allows you choose what metadata types to retrieve.

commands.title: Explain Types
commands.description: Explains metadata types that can be retrieved.

commands.title: Retrieve
commands.description: Retrieves metadata of a business unit.

commands.title: Deploy
commands.description: Deploys local metadata to a business unit.

commands.title: Delete
commands.description: Deletes metadata of selected type and external key.

commands.title: Refresh
commands.description: Ensures that updates are properly published.

commands.title: Retrieve As Template
commands.description: Retrieves a specific metadata file by name from the server for templating.

commands.title: Build Template
commands.description: Builds a template out of a specific metadata file already in your retrieve folder.

commands.title: Build Definition
commands.description: Builds metadata definition based on template.

commands.title: Build Definition Bulk
commands.description: Builds metadata definition based on template en bulk.
